title: Fix typos and style in TestStopFilter
description: This patch fixes some typos in TestStopFilter, it contains also some refactoring of the tests to make them more clear.

comments.author: Alessandro Benedetti
comments.content:
I have reviewed the Pull Request and it is a big +1 from my side.
Can anyone from the community pick it up and give us his opinion?

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 2e586a7e7c8019ee81e7646f95250b172b1c1628 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Diego Ceccarelli
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=2e586a7 ]

LUCENE-8539: fix some typos and improve style in TestStopFilter

Split the test in two tests, use random
